1.title: Book: Tell Me Who You Are
1.subtitle: A roadmap for cultivation racial literacy by Winona Guo and Priya Vulchi

1.title: Celebrating 10 African-American medical pioneers
1.subtitle: These trailblazers broke barriers and shattered stereotypes — and went on to conduct research, discover treatments, and provide leadership that improved the health of millions.

2.title: Princess Omalie
2.subtitle: Welcome To The Wonderful World Of Princess Omalie Unlock the magic and lore of The kingdom of IgboOrai, Africa’s oldest Monarchy and greatest dynasty of kings and queens! We’ve been waiting for you!

products.name: Princess Omalie Doll – Gala Edition
products.description: Princess Omalie comes from a royal lineage of beautiful elegant women and embodies the kindness, confidence and excitement of young girls today. In this Gala Edition, she is exquisitely dressed and coiffed.

products.name: Princess Omalie Doll – Coronation Edition
products.description: Princess Omalie comes from a royal lineage of beautiful elegant women and embodies the kindness, confidence and excitement of young girls today. In this Coronation Edition, she is exquisitely dressed and coifed in a rich, soft cape and a smooth silky costume, designed by "Atelier de Babazongo" – dressmakers of the Royal family. As a treat, she holds a special key as your invitation to unlock the magic of her kingdom.

products.name: Princess Omalie, The Coronation And The Polka Dot Lamb
products.description: Princess Omalie of the African kingdom of IgboOrai could be the happiest girl on the planet — except that her family has been under a curse. Unless the curse of the Goliath beetle necklace is lifted, Omalie’s father might die in a horrible freak accident. He might never be crowned king. Omalie worries about her family, and about her own safety; how will she ever lead a peaceful happy life, have friends, and go to school?

2.title: Robert Tanner Freeman - Bytes of History
2.subtitle: Robert Tanner Freeman was born in Washington DC in 1846. He was the son of slaves who had bought their freedom in the 19th century. Historical records are unclear but they probably adopted the surname Freeman in response to their transition.

3.title: Register to Vote
3.subtitle: Register to vote to make your voice heard and make sure the people we elect to positions of power have the best interests of every American in mind.

3.title: Jarvis Boards
3.subtitle: Jarvis Boards' mission has always been to craft paddle boards in Austin, Texas that are environmentally friendly, look great, and perform well. To accomplish this, we employ a wide range of techniques to craft our small-batch production wooden SUPs in our Austin studio.

products.name: Hollow Core Paddle Board Frame Kits
products.description: There is something magical about creating something with your own two hands. Building your own hollow core paddle board will be one of the most rewarding projects that you'll tackle.

products.name: Let's Surf Y'all! Dad hat
products.description: Let's Surf Y'all! Dad hats aren't just for dads. This one's got a low profile with an adjustable strap and curved visor. Available in khaki and light blue.

products.name: Surf Wax Candle
products.description: We teamed up with our friends at Jimbo's Surf Wax to create a unique line of surf wax candles. Each candle is slow cooked over a wood stove in Maine using surf wax and a hint of coconut.

4.title: Justice for Jacob Blake
4.subtitle: Jacob Blake is a loving father of 6 that deserves proper medical attention and legal representation. The funds raised through this Gofundme will go toward Jacob’s medical bills, family expenses, legal representation, support for his children and therapy costs.

4.title: How students of color confront impostor syndrome
4.subtitle: As a black woman from a tough part of the Bronx who grew up to attain all the markers of academic prestige, Dena Simmons knows that for students of color, success in school sometimes comes at the cost of living authentically. Now an educator herself, Simmons discusses how we might create a classroom that makes all students feel proud of who they are.

5.title: Naja Tea
5.subtitle: At Naja Tea, we stand for quality, integrity, and curiosity. We strive daily to maintain high standards in every aspect of our business. Our mission is to provide a positive, significant, and sensational experience with Naja Tea.

products.name: English Breakfast Tea
products.description: This is a full-bodied, robust, rich and blended to go well with milk and sugar and will give you an energy boost while boosting your immune system.

products.name: Brew-In-Cup with Stainless Infuser & Lid
products.description: A simple design to enjoy loose leaf tea by the cup. Lucidity Brew-in-Cup is a wonderful addition to home and office.

products.name: Biscotti Bites
products.description: A traditional Biscotti recipe modernized using organic, wholesome ingredients and served in smaller, melt-in-your-mouth, bite-sized pieces.

5.title: 26 King Wavy Merch, LLC
5.subtitle: All of our quality brushes are great brushes! They aren't just great for 360 waves. They, too, promote healthy hair in men, women and children, as well as healthy beards.

products.name: Premium Long Handle Brush
products.description: Medium-Hard Brush. This brush is made with nylon bristles and is great for waves, wolfing and natural hair.

products.name: Baby Blue Compression Cap
products.description: Our 2-6 King Wavy Wave Cap is designed to give the ultimate compression. Combined with any of our durags to achieve your maximum 360, 540, 720 wave potential.

products.name: Navy Blue Silk Durag
products.description: Designer Silk Durag

6.title: How we're priming some kids for college — and others for prison
6.subtitle: In the United States, two institutions guide teenagers on the journey to adulthood: college and prison. Sociologist Alice Goffman spent six years in a troubled Philadelphia neighborhood and saw first-hand how teenagers of African-American and Latino backgrounds are funneled down the path to prison — sometimes starting with relatively minor infractions. In an impassioned talk she asks, "Why are we offering only handcuffs and jail time?"

6.title: Uncivil Podcast
6.subtitle: Uncivil brings you stories that were left out of the official history of the Civil War, ransacks America's past, and takes on the history you grew up with. We bring you untold stories about resistance, covert operations, corruption, mutiny, counterfeiting, antebellum drones, and so much more.

7.title: Derek Chauvin Is Sentenced To 22 1/2 Years For George Floyd's Murder
7.subtitle: A Minnesota judge sentenced Derek Chauvin to 22 1/2 years in prison for the murder of George Floyd — a punishment that exceeds the state's minimum guidelines but falls short of prosecutors' request of a 30-year sentence.

7.title: Fewer Cards
7.subtitle: Fewer Cards is a touchless smart card that allows you to express yourself and share who you are with others by exchanging contact information, social media, and data seamlessly. The concept of Fewer Cards started from the fact that exchanging paper business cards is wasteful and cumbersome.

8.title: MoreFire! Hot Sauce
8.subtitle: MoreFire! Hot Sauce is a concoction of spicy fiery goodness. For those who are serious about good quality food. We are 1st place nationwide award winning... so get on the winning Team. You need MoreFire! in your life!

products.name: MoreFire! Hot Sauce (Original)
products.description: 5 oz bottle of the multi-award winning Goldson’s MoreFire! Hot Sauce… Ay Yo! I GOT THAT FIRE!

products.name: MoreFire! Pepper Sauce (Louisiana Style)
products.description: 5 oz bottle of the 1st place Award Winning MoreFire! Pepper Sauce… Ay Yo! I GOT THAT FIRE!

products.name: I Got That Fire! T-Shirt – Box block
products.description: I Got That Fire! T-Shirt – Box block

8.title: The Other Wes Moore
8.subtitle: Two kids named Wes Moore were born blocks apart within a year of each other. Both grew up fatherless in similar Baltimore neighborhoods and had difficult childhoods; both hung out on street corners with their crews; both ran into trouble with the police. How, then, did one grow up to be a Rhodes Scholar, decorated veteran, White House Fellow, and business leader, while the other ended up a convicted murderer serving a life sentence?

9.title: Brown v. Board: Timeline of School Integration in the U.S.
9.subtitle: Trace school integration from 1849 to 2007.

9.title: How the Negro National League Was Formed | Field of Dreams...Deferred
9.subtitle: The Negro National League debuted 100 years ago with world-class players and legions of fans. Hear how founder Rube Foster formed the league in Part 1 of "Field of Dreams...Deferred," a four-part series from TBS.

10.title: Askanya
10.subtitle: Les Chocolateries Askanya is Haiti’s first and only premier bean-to-bar chocolate company. We exclusively use Haitian cacao to produce our chocolates in our facility located in Ouanaminthe, Haiti.

products.name: Bouquet Vert
products.description: Bouquet Vert is our Lime Chocolate Bar - a dark and rich cacao bar infused with with mellow, floral and citrus - feels like a rich earth and lime trees in full bloom. There are notes of candied lime and something toasty. It's a slow melt, but that only helps savoring each new layer of flavor.

products.name: Paradis
products.description: Paradis has a rich and creamy texture, with delicious chocolate flavors and subtle fruit flavors, providing additional complexity.

products.name: Wanga Nègès
products.description: Wanga Nègès is creamy and smooth, with a rich, chocolate taste and a complex mélange, from caramel to dried fruit.

10.title: Dr. Ernest Everett Just
10.subtitle: Dr. Ernest Just was a pioneering African American biologist, academic and science writer. Just's primary legacy is his recognition of the fundamental role of the cell surface in the development of organisms.

11.title: BLK & Bold
11.subtitle: BLK & Bold welcomes the obligation to equip young people with tools to live their best lives and overcome familiar unfortunate circumstances by turning a daily ritual, enjoying a cup of coffee & tea, into a means of giving back. BLK & Bold pledges 5% of its profits to initiatives aligned to sustaining youth programming, enhancing workforce development, and eradicating youth homelessness.

products.name: La Guadalupe, Honduras - Single Origin (Direct Trade), Light Roast
products.description: As these beans are directly sourced from Finca La Guadalupe, this single origin will satisfy your desire for a creamy bodied light roast. With undertones of caramel and honey, this will become your everyday coffee.

products.name: Jasmine Loose Leaf Green Tea
products.description: Satisfy both smell and taste with this Jasmine Tea! Lightly smooth & sweet, it contains green tea leaves absorbed with fragrance from jasmine petals. This produces a cup that is very sensual with floral aromatics

products.name: BLK & Bold Logo Dad Hats
products.description: 2020 BLK & Bold Logo Dad Hat. Black/White/Yellow

11.title: Classify White Supremacist Groups as Domestic Terrorist Organizations
11.subtitle: Request a new legal requirement to register, classify, and subsequently surveil white supremacist organizations as domestic terrorist organizations. By classifying these groups as intimidating to the American population and dangerous to human life, the institutions responsible for protecting citizens against such groups will have the necessary information and resources to prevent further destruction carried out by these violent terrorist groups.

12.title: Understanding My Privilege
12.subtitle: University Chancellor, Susan E. Borrego, reflects on her life as an emancipated minor and dissects the emotionally charged conversation surrounding race relations in the United States. This raconteur uses her powerful first-person account of "White Privilege" and "Black Lives Matter" to underscore the responsibility each one of us has to bring about change.

12.title: Smile Natural Products
12.subtitle: After struggling to find an ethical, big-brand hygiene company, Founder and Chief Executive Officer Brian Mays decided to create one with Smile Natural Products.

products.name: Toothpaste Sampler Pack
products.description: Can't choose? Try all four toothpaste flavors and find your favorite! Mint + Charcoal, Cinnamon + Clove, Vanilla + Lavender, Ginger + Turmeric

products.name: Aromatherapy Diffuser
products.description: The Aromatherapy Diffuser scents your home to your mood!  Add our 100%, pure essential oils to this handmade, ceramic diffuser to freshen up any room in your home.

products.name: Lavender Essential Oil
products.description: Bulgarian Lavender Essential Oil is a common favorite in aromatherapy use. Lavender is well known for its calming properties, as well as being the most versatile essential oil out there.

13.title: Colorism in the Beauty Industry
13.subtitle: America has progressed tremendously over recent years in terms of racial inequality, but colorism remains to be seen on a global scale.

14.title: Ban or Restrict Tear Gas
14.subtitle: The use of tear gas has been banned and is illegal in war. This same tear gas is used by the law enforcement, to control unarmed crowds protesting for the BLM movement. Tear gas is also used for border control and is thrown at innocent migrants who are unarmed and pose no sudden threat to anyone in the vicinity.

14.title: Two more cis Black women banned from Olympics for their natural testosterone levels
14.subtitle: Christine Mboma and Beatrice Masilingi are the latest accomplished athletes to be excluded under the rule that devastated Caster Semenya's career.

15.title: MLK: The Other America
15.subtitle: Dr. Martin Luther King, Jr.’s 1967 speech at Stanford. Here, he expounds on his nonviolent philosophy and methodology.

15.title: Frederick Douglass
15.subtitle: Frederick Douglass was an escaped slave who became a prominent activist, author and public speaker.

16.title: CarmaBella Skincare
16.subtitle: CarmaBella Skincare is made for women who want the best skincare, without any artificial chemicals or unnecessary ingredients. When using our products, you don't have to choose between natural and luxurious.

products.name: Brightening Turmeric Clay Mask
products.description: Want an instant glow? We have the perfect natural skincare product to help you achieve it. The Brightening Turmeric Clay Mask instantly brightens dull, tired skin and restores your skins healthy complexion over time.

products.name: HydroSurge Moisturizing Gel
products.description: The HydroSurge Moisturizing Gel replenishes water and helps to improve your skin's moisture barrier, resulting in smooth, hydrated skin. This addictively refreshing gel leaves skin plump, dewy, and glowing.

products.name: The Essential Bath & Body Set
products.description: The Essential Bath & Body Set is a nourishing collection that will leave your skin feeling soft and moisturized all day. This set includes the Natural Sugar Based Body Wash, a bath puff, and the Nourishing Shea Body Lotion.

16.title: How to Be an Antiracist
16.subtitle: Ibram X. Kendi's concept of antiracism reenergizes and reshapes the conversation about racial justice in America—but even more fundamentally, points us toward liberating new ways of thinking about ourselves and each other.

17.title: 57 Chocolate
17.subtitle: 57 is the pioneer bean to bar chocolate business in Ghana. ’57 Chocolate is short for 1957, which is the year of Ghana’s independence. This venture uses resources grown within the country to create delicious treats.

products.name: Chocolate Chips
products.description: Get them in dark chocolate (71.5%) or milk chocolate (49%)

products.name: Adinkra Bars
products.description: Our Adinkra bars are beautiful bite-sized bars engraved with visual symbols originally created by the Ashanti of Ghana. A minimum of 2 chocolates and a maximum of 6 fit in our adinkra boxes. They are perfect for a quick treat and come in dark, milk, white, mocha latte, bissap, and moringa.

products.name: Chocolate Gift Box
products.description: Get a set of 6 or 12 bars to give as a gift to the chocolate-lover in your life.

17.title: The Get Real Movement
17.subtitle: Get REAL is a Canadian non-profit that combats LGBTQ+ discrimination and promotes acceptance in schools, summer camps, and workplaces. Our merchandise helps fund our work! Every order is shipped with a piece of feedback written by real students across Canada who have participated in one of our workshops

products.name: No Homophobia T-Shirt
products.description: This piece is a statement. It's a statement about what we believe, what we do, and who we are.

products.name: Love is Love Tank
products.description: Love Is Love Is Love Is Love.

products.name: Retro Pride 2018 Tank Top
products.description: This is a print collaboration with artist Emily Deechaleune.

18.title: Justice for the Murder of Rayshard Brooks
18.subtitle: Rayshard Brooks, an unarmed, 27 year old Black man was murdered after 3 officers responded to complaints of him sleeping in his vehicle in the Wendy’s parking lot. After struggling with the officers, Brooks began to run for his life, when he was shot in the back more than once.

18.title: Princess Planet
18.subtitle: Princess Planet is a brand of children's entertainment that helps promote characters with diverse hair textures, skin tones, and cultural backgrounds.

products.name: An Octet of Odes – Volume 1
products.description: An Octet of Odes Volume One is a compilation of poems that premiers eight unique characters from Princess Planet. Each character is imagined with both magic and realism. They are created in a world that is as scientific as it is colorful, adventurous, and fun. All of the princesses’ stories are rooted in the realities of geography and history. They all reflect a love of learning and an appreciation for language, diversity, and culture.

products.name: An Octet of Odes – Volume 2
products.description: An Octet of Odes Volume Two is a compilation of poems that premiers eight unique characters from Princess Planet. Each character is imagined with both magic and realism. They are created in a world that is as scientific as it is colorful, adventurous, and fun.

products.name: Princess Planet: Coloring book
products.description: The Princess Planet Coloring Book showcases sixteen unique characters from Princess Planet. Each character is imagined with both magic and realism. They are created in a world that is as scientific as it is colorful, adventurous, and fun. All of the princesses’ stories are rooted in the realities of geography and history. They all reflect a love of learning and an appreciation for language, diversity, and culture.

19.title: How we can make racism a solvable problem — and improve policing
19.subtitle: When we define racism as behaviors instead of feelings, we can measure it — and transform it from an impossible problem into a solvable one, says justice scientist Dr. Phillip Atiba Goff. In an actionable talk, he shares his work at the Center for Policing Equity, an organization that helps police departments diagnose and track racial gaps in policing in order to eliminate them.

19.title: As I Am
19.subtitle: As I Am hair is a natural hair care brand. It markets unique and exclusively formulated hair products. It consists of 11 products designed for tightly coiled hair made from the finest organic ingredients. The line then became a quick success.

products.name: Coconut CoWash 16 oz
products.description: You already know it and your hair can feel it! CoWashing is the way to cleanse your hair most of the time. This light no-suds conditioning cream gently removes residue including all of the things you've used to style and maintain your coils and curls. Now it's time for a sparkling new beginning.

products.name: Coils & Curls Care Package
products.description: Experience the superb performance of As I Am® products with this economical starter set. Designed to nurture and style the texture that’s naturally yours.

products.name: Moisturizing Hand Sanitizer
products.description: Kills 99.99% Of All Common Germs. Eliminates Bacteria On Skin. Anti Microbial. Contains 62% Ethyl Alcohol. Fragrance Free. Unscented. Enriched with Aloe Vera, Betaine, and Glycerin. 73% Increase in Skin Hydration. This Gentle formula Improves Skin Health by 41%

20.title: Feed Love
20.subtitle: Our mission is to create a culture, through quality apparel, where seeing, being and feeding love, can change the world.

20.title: The symbols of systemic racism — and how to take away their power
20.subtitle: Multidisciplinary artist and TED Fellow Paul Rucker is unstitching the legacy of systemic racism in the United States. A collector of artifacts connected to the history of slavery — from branding irons and shackles to postcards depicting lynchings — Rucker couldn't find an undamaged Ku Klux Klan robe for his collection, so he began making his own.

21.title: How to be an Antiracist
21.subtitle: This conversation with professor Ibram X. Kendi was recorded during the 2019 Aspen Ideas Festival in Aspen, Colorado. In it, he explores what an antiracist society might look like, how we can play an active role in building it, and what being an antiracist in your own context might mean.

21.title: Find Your Representatives
21.subtitle: Here you can find your representatives, how to contact them, bills they’ve introduced, committees they serve on, and political contributions they’ve received.

22.title: Me and White Supremacy
22.subtitle: Based on the viral Instagram challenge that captivated participants worldwide, Me and White Supremacy takes readers on a 28-day journey, complete with journal prompts, to do the necessary and vital work that can ultimately lead to improving race relations.

22.title: Beyond the Numbers: The Experiential Effects of Stereotype Threat on Students of Color at TCU
22.subtitle: This study aims to examine if and how the effects of negative stereotypes of students of color are felt beyond the statistical measures of academic success, reaching into the classroom and social experiences of these students.

23.title: Inn8 Apparel
23.subtitle: Your mind. Your body. Your individuality. Your imperfections. These are the things you are born with. They are innate. Embrace them. They are yours. Celebrate them. They are yours. Love them. They are you.

products.name: "Beholder" Embroidered Unisex Hoodie

products.name: Essential Oil
products.description: All of our essential oils are pure therapeutic grade and offer various health benefits.

When you hear music that you like, when you're listening to a book of your choosing, you get excited, or motivated or you may become active.

products.name: RayTec Wireless Speaker

24.title: Find Black-owned bookstores near you
24.subtitle: The African American Literature Book Club (AALBC.com) has put together a map of Blac-owned bookstores across the US. Find your nearest one here.

25.title: Diarrablu
25.subtitle: The Diarrablu mission is to iterate for sustainability while highlighting the African continent’s rich colors and unique patterns through practical and versatile pieces designed using mathematical concepts or algorithms.

products.name: Sustainable Mailys Dress - Noir
products.description: Sustainable, artisanal and size inclusive, the Mailys Dress is easily convertible into over 19 different styles. This garment is a comfortable and versatile dress thoughtfully designed to fit all body shapes and sizes.

products.name: Headwrap - Suto
products.description: These statement pieces are part of our zero-waste sustainable approach as we believe in maximizing the usage of all our fabrics.

products.name: Hidden in Ocho Rios | Art Print
products.description: In this piece, we daydream of an impromptu retreat in Ocho Rios, Jamaica in a hidden tree-house covered in palm leaves.

25.title: Dawoud Bey: The Birmingham Project
25.subtitle: In 2005 American photographer Dawoud Bey visited Birmingham, Alabama, to explore the possibility of making work that would commemorate the September 15, 1963, bombing of the 16th Street Baptist Church. The Birmingham Project, a series that includes photographic diptychs and a split-screen video, is Bey’s powerful response.

26.title: Gentleman AF
26.subtitle: Gentleman AF is a beard care line featuring a beard wash, beard oils, and beard balms for classy men with a dash of savagery.

products.name: Beard Balms
products.description: Scoop a dime sized amount of beard balm with your finger and place it in the palm of your hands. Rub it between both palms until it melts. Apply it to your beard, comb it down and style as desired.

products.name: Beard Wash
products.description: Wet your face and neck, place a small amount of beard wash in the palm of your hands and massage it into your beard and face, including your neck. Rinse your beard thoroughly.

products.name: Beard Oils
products.description: Shake well before use. Drop a dime sized amount of beard oil in the palm of your hands. Rub your hands and apply the oil from your skin to the tip of your beard.

26.title: The Bail Project
26.subtitle: The Bail Project™ National Revolving Bail Fund is on a mission to combat mass incarceration and reshape the pretrial system in the United States. 100% of online donations are used to bring people home. Since bail money comes back to us when cases close, we're able to recycle every dollar donated at least twice per year.

27.title: Designs by Tee LLC
27.subtitle: Brooklyn Social Worker designing positive t-shirts and apparel. Supporting homeless children and families in NYC.

27.title: #JusticeforBre: Police officers who killed Breonna Taylor must be FIRED.
27.subtitle: Call for the three police officers responsible for the death of Breonna Taylor to be fired and charged for murder.

28.title: Book: The Global Beauty Industry
28.subtitle: Colorism, Racism, and the National Body

28.title: Omalicha Naturals
28.subtitle: Omalicha translates to beautiful in our native language of Igbo. We handcraft all natural, clean beauty products for the hair and skin designed to bring ones natural beauty to the forefront.

products.name: Sweet Marula Replenishing Facial Serum
products.description: Our Sweet Marula Replenishing Facial serum is a blend of light oils and botanical extracts. This meticulous blend soothes and moisturizes the skin after cleansing, easily penetrating the skin revealing an instant glow.

products.name: Lavender Cucumber Bliss facial toner
products.description: Our Lavender Cucumber Bliss facial toner soothes and restores balance to the skin. Its non-alcoholic astringent fights breakouts without drying the skin.

products.name: Avocado Mango Deep Treatment Mask
products.description: Our Avocado Mango Deep Treatment Mask is a thick, creamy deep conditioner fortified with luscious oils, botanical extracts and soft butters. It is used after cleansing the hair to impart moisture and elasticity back into your strands.

29.title: Kintu New York
29.subtitle: Kintu handbags are designed in New York, co-developed with global artisans, and made in Italy. The Kintu brand appeals to the dynamic, busy, urban woman who values quality and self-expression.

29.title: Racism has a cost for everyone
29.subtitle: Racism makes our economy worse — and not just in ways that harm people of color, says public policy expert Heather C. McGhee. From her research and travels across the US, McGhee shares startling insights into how racism fuels bad policymaking and drains our economic potential — and offers a crucial rethink on what we can do to create a more prosperous nation for all.

30.title: National Bail Out
30.subtitle: National Bail Out is a Black-led and Black-centered collective of abolitionist organizers, lawyers and activists building a community-based movement to support our folks and end systems of pretrial detention and ultimately mass incarceration. We are people who have been impacted by cages — either by being in them ourselves or witnessing our families and loved ones be encaged. We are queer, trans, young, elder, and immigrant.

30.title: What Anti-racist Teachers Do Differently
30.subtitle: They view the success of black students as central to the success of their own teaching. Read more from Pirette McKamey, principal of San Francisco’s Mission High School and an anti-racist educator for more than 30 years.

31.title: The RACE Method Of Talking To A Racism Skeptic
31.subtitle: The RACE Method is an approach that anti-racism allies can take to trying to share their perspective with people who are skeptical that racism against people of color is a problem worthy of specific attention. It is based on principles from non-violent communication and on findings from the science of persuasion.

31.title: Coral Oral
31.subtitle: Not only are these toothbrushes more aesthetically pleasing, you differentiate each brush by its pattern and not by its color. Our company is proudly black owned and highlights oral health facts including a Black history fact that we all should know!

products.name: Medium 4-Pack
products.description: A full brush head and precision cut bristles to reach the tooth's total surface. Gently cleans and massages gums, tongue and teeth. Medium bristles sure not to cause any damage or pain!

products.name: Soft Single-Pack
products.description: A full brush head and precision cut bristles to reach the tooth's total surface. Gently cleans and massages gums, tongue and teeth. Soft bristles sure not to cause any damage or pain!

products.name: Medium Single-Pack
products.description: A full brush head and precision cut bristles to reach the tooth's total surface. Gently cleans and massages gums, tongue and teeth. Medium bristles sure not to cause any damage or pain!
